name: ⚙️ INSTALL NETIQ EDIRECTORY PRACTICE
description:
Installation/Configuration Steps
  1. Run this Action one time to install the Cimitra eDirectory Practice Bash script. To learn more about this script you encouraged to see the README for this script.

    [ SEE THE README ]

  2. Edit the settings_edir.cfg file located in: /var/opt/cimitra/scritps/edir as explained in the [ README ]

  3. Test the cimitra_edir.sh script as explained in the [ README ]
